name: Another Idle Tycoon Game
description:
This is an Idle, Tycoon, Clicker style game, based on the massive trend of Idle Tycoon games. The game is pretty simple. There are four shapes that are more and more expensive. The circle is $100, the line is $1000, the triangle is $20,000 and the square is $100,000. Try to make as much money as you can! BTW, I made this in P5.js (P5js.org)

Note: if it doesn’t work for you here, then you can go to https://mangonotthere.github.io/Another-Idle-Game/
